Pratilipi - Data Scientist - Internship at Pratilipi

Location - Job Location: Bengaluru, Work Type: Full time

Internships June 01, 2022

About Company

Pratilipi has 20M+ monthly active users and 2M+ daily active users, and we aim to be impacting over 500M+ users in the near future.

About the Team:

We're a small team of smart engineers working closely with the Product, Business and Data Science teams to build experiments and features that enable delightful experiences for our Users.

We learn from each other and iterate rapidly to make a larger impact. Our Micro-services architecture allows us to be Polyglot in the technology stack. We are completely hosted on AWS Platform. We are available to users via Web, Android and iOS.

We work in a high ownership, high responsibility environment.

Our Tech Stack:

https://lnkd.in/gAR54Vy

Website:

www.pratilipi.com

Glimpse of our scale:

  • 2M+ DAU
  • 20M+ MAU
  • 1.3+ billion requests per day spread cross 40+ micro-services
  • Resting around 10TB of data
  • Daily ingestion of 500GB data

Position Responsibilities :

  • PYour primary focus will be in applying data science techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction models integrated with our products.
  • Engage with different stakeholders and evangelize data aware decision making capabilities.
  • Define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to the appropriate and accurate insights
  • Work on different business problems by converting them to ML problems and building models for solving them

Position Requirements:

  • Excellent problem solving skills
  • Hands on handling large data sets, performing statistical analysis and presenting results.
  • Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, CART, Deep Learning, and NLP
  • Experience with common data science toolkits, such as NumPy, Tensor Flow, scikit-learn, etc.
  • Demonstrated skills in programming in Python and SQL.
  • Experience with working on cloud systems such as AWS is a plus.
  • Educational qualifications should be preferably in Computer Science or statistics or engineering or a related area.

Do Not Apply If You Are Not:

  • Ownership driven
  • Curious in general
  • Self motivated
  • Use to work in a chaotic environment
  • Highly proactive
Apply
